snippet: The Houston Texans released the nine-time Pro Bowl safety Ed Reed and put running back Arian Foster on injured reserve Tuesday, the latest letdowns in a disastrous season.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Green Bay Packers, having lost two quarterbacks in two weeks, sign Matt Flynn; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Houston Texans released the nine-time Pro Bowl safety Ed Reed and put running back Arian Foster on injured reserve Tuesday, the latest letdowns in a disastrous season.

headline.main: Texans Drop Safety Reed, Who Faded
headline.print_headline:
Quarterbacks Out, Packers
Turn to Flynn
